```{r 1, echo = FALSE}
biz <- read_csv("yelp_subset.csv") 
tip <- read_csv("yelp_tip1.csv") 
review_1000 <- read_csv("yelp_review_1000.csv") 

biz_tip_join <- biz %>%
  full_join(tip, by = "business_id")

biz_tip_review_join <- biz_tip_join %>%
  full_join(review_1000, by = "business_id")
 
```
